game.name: ACE Strategy: Mecha Nova
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A tactical roguelike deck building game. Recruit elite mecha pilots, deploy drones and cast commands. Master your ACE mechas while collecting unique cards and chips in battles, and form your own build for total battlefield dominance.
